description:
After the Disc Zone`s collapse, its residents along with Taiki`s team all take refuge in the Shinobi Zone. But soon shards of Blastmon`s crystals, which had stuck to the Digimon`s bodies after the battle, turn into a doppelganger of Blastmon and begin to attack! Shoutmon manages to defeat Blastmon, but he is clearly not in top form and struggles in the fight. Finally Taiki and the others notice that Shoutmon`s behavior is strange, and begin to suspect that he`s up to something under the cover of night...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: シャウトモン, キングの証!
